name: "JUGGED" PROTOTYPE 2.0
description:
WARNING: This game is in no way finished. anything is subject to change, the credits for the game are not finished, so if you have been promised a part, or have been working on this game with me along the way, your credit will be said when the game is final. ALL FEEDBACK IS APPRECIATED.

This Game is being created for the Leviathan Discord server, This game will feature references to Mods and ugh you know the famous and rich Kabunga of course. Levi will be the main character obviously and he will be fighting off the PURPLED ARMY. At least that is what we got so far. We are really making this game up as we go along, so if you have any ideas for the fan made game of the famous fortnite kid, please leave a comment below!

Levi's Discord: https://discord.gg/fRUFByyQJc

UPDATES:  AUG.28th: MENU,  MUSIC UI, MENU ART AUG.29th: MUSIC UI SPRITE CHANGES, BUG FIXES AUG.30th: BETTER COMBAT CONTROLS, IMPROVED MENU AI, TEMPORARY SHITTY TUTORIAL, PAUSE OPTION, ASPECT RATIO FIX AUG.31st: BUG FIXES, XBOX AND PLAYSTATION  CONTROLLER SUPPORT

COMING UP: BETTER TUTORIAL, MORE MAPS/ROOMS, NEW ENEMIES

PLANNED UPDATES:

DESKTOP ICON, SPLASH LOADING SCREEN, MUSIC IF ART, MORE LEVELS, A BULLSHIT STORY,  CHARACTER UPGRADES, PAUSE MENU, ACHIEVMENT HUNTING BABY, MORE MUSIC, CONTROLLER SUPPORT, POWER UPS, MUSIC VOLUME SAVES ITSELF AFTER GAME IS CLOSED

BUG FIXES:

AUG.29th: ESCAPE KEY WASN'T WORKING PROPERLY ON CERTAIN ROOMS

AUG.31st: "GAME PAUSED" TEXT CHANGED  POSITION ON WINDOW RESIZE
